betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The key behind understanding unknown phenomena is to understand the patterns that define them.
Magical properties follow some sort of conservation law, where the vital energy I possess, what on Earth we call essence, can be transferred to inanimate objects too.
Some of these connections appear to be strong, while others aren't, and some are straight up inconsequential.
By being able to move these enchantments between objects, I can find good ways to combine them.
